name: agent
content:
<situation name="{SITNAME}" mapAllAttributes="Y">
      <class name="{EIF_CLASS}" />
      <slot slotName="msg">
        <literalString value="{MSG_MAP}" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="probe">
        <literalString value="{PROBE_MAP}" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="threshold">
        <literalString value="{THRESHOLD_1}" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="profile">
        <literalString value="{PROFILE}" />
      </slot>
    </situation>
